output: Introducing Blueberry Sage, a delicious new sparkling beverage! Made from pure blueberries, pure sage and flavored with a hint of agave, this beverage is not only delicious but also packed with antioxidants, vitamin A and C, healthy fats and even a natural calming agent. Perfect for those days when you need a refreshing boost, this beverage is sure to add a sparkle to your day. Enjoy on its own or as a mixer in cocktails and mocktails. Cheers!
